section.heading: Delivery to and Return from Polls.

para.text: Board to Develop. The State Administrator shall develop, in consultation with the local boards, a written plan for the prompt and secure delivery of voting units and other election day equipment and materials to and from polling places.
Inclusions. The plan shall specify the methods of and time frames for these deliveries and returns.

section.heading: Polling Place Readiness and Set-Up.
section.text: Election judges and other assigned personnel shall prepare and set up their respective polling places as required by:

para.text: All supplemental directives of the local board or State Board.

annotations.annotation: Election Law Article, §§2-102(b)(4) and 2-202(b), Annotated Code of Maryland
